alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 03 at 2:27AM PST until February 04 at 12:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO NOON PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 30 will result in frost formation. For the Wind Advisory, northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...San Diego County Valleys. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, until 9 AM PST this morning. For the Wind Advisory, from noon today to noon PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
